review:
The professionalism : We called up around 8.15 PM, and the good doctor said we can still come; we reached at the clinic around 8.30 and the doctor accommodated us even though it was closing time. He heard us patiently for almost 1/2 hour and clarified each and every doubt in a lucid and practical manner. He not only looked at our issues ( fuzzy eating habits, cut near the chin and rashes near the neck ) but also asked regarding the behavioral issues if at all we are facing, and gave us very nice advice regarding food selection/calorie etc. 

All in all I must admit that he is a patient listener and believes in holistic approach towards solving the kids issue. It might sound more like a behavioral aspect - but I am inclined to talk in that manner as our daughter has rashes which in itself is not a big issue, but we were more looking for her fuzzy eating habits. 

I would recommend Dr. Satish for anyone looking for pediatric care along with root-cause analysis of all the child issues emanating from behavior.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Satish is very friendly, Calm in nature and very patience listening to detail of the problem. He will give enough time to explain the problem that child is facing, **** ** **** ********  ** ****** ** **** ********Speaking to him will give confidence to the parent to handle the child's problem. I can suggest, just follow what he says.

Unnecessary treatments will not be suggested by him. Finding a doctor is not a deal but finding a good doctor who treats well is every one wanted. He belongs to such a category. Kudos!! to Dr.Satish

Dr. Satish is one of the best pediatricians we have ever met in the city. He believes in his art and is a practitioner with a big heart. He is always there for you whenever you need him for anything related to your child. One thing i must admit is his attention to detail when it comes to kids' vaccination. I have personally not seen such deligence and thoughtfuless from any pediatricans in Bangalore when administering medicines to kids. A great human being and a patient listener, he is a child's best friend. A true gentleman and a go-to-man for any child related queries and cure. We would highly recommend him.

context: Child specialists ,Pediatric Vaccinations,Child nutrition Guidance,Children's Health,Childhood Nutrition and Child Safety,
review: Dr. Satish is an awesome doctor who really cares for his patients. He takes sufficient time to listen to our queries, he even clarifies some doubts even before we ask him. He educates and explains the various best practices, medications and vaccinations types available for child care with the background research and surveys done. The information given by doctor gave us a lot of clarity. The clinic is very neat and tidy, well maintained. Also he is available on all weekdays and weekends, easier to approach without any tight booking schedules. We as new parents express our sincere gratitude and thankfulness for the doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Went for my kid's eye infection. Well firstly, very very disappointed to see practo has so many positive reviews about the doctor, ***** * *** ********* the basic nature of a pediatrician has to be being friendly with the child. Absolutely zero friendliness with the kid. My kid is 8 months old and gave a smile as soon as he saw the doctor *** ** *** ***** ****** ******* And he has got so many reviews about being friendly with kids and very jovial. * **** ******* *** ******* ** **** His communication is absolutely terrible, he explains everything in one or 2 words. ***** **** **** *** ******* *** * ****** as parents wants to know more and understand what is going on with the symptoms. We were explaining the problem and he takes calls in front of us without even asking or at least saying excuse me, ***** ******** Looked like doesnt want to spend much time, which again every review is appreciating. He prescribed an ointment for the eye which generally is not given for kids less than 1 year. He did not explain any side affects.  ***** ******** *** ******** ** **** *** *** ******* ** *** ****** **** ** **** *** **** We were worried and called the doctor, he very casually tells its ok and asks us to apply the ointment again, ******* * **** **** ** ****** ****** ** **** **** ** **** ****** *** **** * ***** *** ******** ****** At last tired of his overall attitude went to another doctor suggested by a colleague, *** ******* ********* *** ** ******** ******** ** *** ******** *** **** ** ************ *** ********** ***** *** **** ** **** ***** ** **** ** ***** ********** ** *** ** ***** **** ****** *** ** *** ********* *** * ***** *** **** **** ** **** ****** ** ****** *** **** ******** **** ****** **** ***** ** *** ***** ******* ***** ** ********* *** **** ****** ** ******** ******* *** ********** **** *** **** Friendliness, diagnosis, symptoms, care, assurance, professionalism, communication. Every area needs improvement.

Before giving my experiance with Dr. Satish, i would like to share my experiance with Motherhood Hospital.
I was consulting in Motherhood Hospital Sahakar Nagar for my baby's vaccination. I could not get polio vaccine there. There are 3 polio vaccines available  in Market (Poliovac/Imovac/Polprotec) Hospital pharmacy doesn't have any of this. I waited for 7-8 days for the vaccine & followed with hospital every alternate day but nothing helped. I am surprised such a big hospital not having stock of vaccines. Finally  i got this done at Blossm.

Dr. Satish gives enough time to each patient. Kind enough to explain my queries related to vaccination. All vaccines were availble &  I am fully satisfied.

A very patient listner who actually checks the history before jumping to conclusions..... Treats exactly based on symptoms...I really felt that rather than waiting for the doc..  the time he spent for check up was sufficient enough and he is never in a hurry to attend next patients. Does a through check up of a infant and Triea to build a relationship with the baby ..... To understand the problem..... I rather felt he is a person sitting there to serve people rather than ppl u find who just make money and try to rid u off soon.....

He speaks little low volume but explains every information related to newborn properly. First he hears all our newborn issues pointwise and then explain us each points very calmly. Overall good experience as it increases our confidence and clears pur confusion or misconceptions.

1. Doctor  gives time to each patient and listen to the patient.
2. He doesn't prescribe too many/unnecessary medicines.
3. He will not make you panic , gives appropriate suggestion/answer for all the doubts.
Very good doctor and I recommend him.
Overall I am happy and satisfied with the treatment given to my daughter.
Cons : Need to wait for long time even if you have booked an appointment.( that's the case with almost every doctor)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Satish listens to your child problem lot of patience and advice the best ever care. He gives enough time to each and every patient. He doesn't recommend any additional medicines which are not required and completely avoid antibiotics. I have been very satisfied so far as i consult him for both my kids. For any urgent matter or emergency, he is always reachable on his cell phone.

The professionalism : We called up around 8.15 PM, and the good doctor said we can still come; we reached at the clinic around 8.30 and the doctor accommodated us even though it was closing time. He heard us patiently for almost 1/2 hour and clarified each and every doubt in a lucid and practical manner. He not only looked at our issues ( fuzzy eating habits, cut near the chin and rashes near the neck ) but also asked regarding the behavioral issues if at all we are facing, and gave us very nice advice regarding food selection/calorie etc. 

All in all I must admit that he is a patient listener and believes in holistic approach towards solving the kids issue. It might sound more like a behavioral aspect - but I am inclined to talk in that manner as our daughter has rashes which in itself is not a big issue, but we were more looking for her fuzzy eating habits. 

I would recommend Dr. Satish for anyone looking for pediatric care along with root-cause analysis of all the child issues emanating from behavior.

review: Most of the doctor's treat for illness, some thing great about him is understood problem and written prescription for 5 days to target current issue and priscribed another medicine for 15 days to ensure the issue doesn't pressist, Due to repeated cold and cough , we have stopped giving milk to my baby, now he advised to give one glass of milk and monitor else suggested for soya milk. my baby will be happy, she love to drink milk.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: The doctor does thorough checkup of the kids. He gave the ***** medicines, was available on call (I had to call him as my son was running high fever despite medication), he prescribed additional medicine over phone. He assured me that the kid will be fine in 2-3 days time and the same happened. Really happy with the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor was very soft spoken and checked my daughter for viral infection and asked few questions for which surprisingly my daughter responded. He dint prescribe any antibiotics and gave just one medicine and suggested to wait for few more days for further course of medicine. He was honest in telling us that the my daughter’s temperature has started reducing and no need for higher medications. 

Thank you doctor

We had visited several Pediatricians before in Bangalore for my daughter and everyone would just tell us to use antibiotics even for small cough or cold and even for viral fever.  Some even would ask us to take x-rays as well. 

He is the only one who never prescribe antibiotics and explained why it should not be taken for such minor illness and his treatment had been quite effective. We have been visiting him for last 3 years.

Thank god i took my 19 month old daughter to dr.sateesha. He almost solved all our problems, it was our first visit there. Doc made both baby n us very comfortable, guided us very well of all our doubts
I would definitely recommend him to every parent.

Dr Satish is a very good. He listens and understands the patient's concern and responds accordingly. Inspite of being busy all the time he gives enough time to every patient.
He does not give unnecesarry medicines.
I would definitely recemmond the doctor.

Very good doctor, so patience, explained in detailed, answered to all our questions very politely. 

Thanks to Practo, I booked an appointment through Practo APP, after reaching to Clinic we found many people waiting outside, we thought may be we have to wait for a long time. I just told appointment name and immediately the receptionist took me inside, I was shocked, thank you so much Practo......I recommend your App to people..!!

A very nice hand.. and a handy doctor.. a warmhearted humanbeing.. keeps every important and micro things at special care.. we have been to him since three years... all the times we visit, we felt happy in his treatments and suggestions.. we vote him as one of the best doctors available in bangalore city..

Absolutely a great peadiatrician to meet & get your kids to show him. A VERY POLITE,SOFT SPOKEN,PLEASING,DELIGHTFULL,DOWN TO EARTH,MASTERY IN HIS CLINICAL APPROACH,
AMAZING EXPERIENCE .he treated my kid with utmost care & concern.im very happy with him.
i would happily suggest/recommand him, for all parents & kids.
Thank you doctor Satish
god bless you & your clinic
good day
